listing.listing_description:
Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Beach Enclave is a superb residential community on Long Bay Beach, along the southeast shore of Providenciales. Designed by SWA Architects and Domino Creative Interior Designers, the villas balance high-end contemporary amenities with an emphasis on sustainability and natural materials, harmonizing with the precious ecosystem of Turks and Caicos. This seven-bedroom gem features generous alfresco living and dining areas, luminous interiors, and breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea. A five-bedroom main house and two-bedroom guesthouse (including five king suites in all) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to fourteen in size. Your vacation rental includes an impressive array of services and guest perks both in-house and within Beach Enclave.

Perched amid lush tropical flora within steps of the sea, the gated property offers ample space for outdoor enjoyments. Tiered terraces create a graceful flow from the interiors to the white-sand beach, maximizing the ocean views on every level. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs lining the pool, or on the beachfront deck with accompanying wet bar. Dip into the turquoise sea and return to barbeque meals in the pergola's shade. Linger outdoors at sunset and deep into the night, sipping island cocktails in the enchanting breeze.

The interiors enjoy an open-air ambiance, with wide pocket doors opening from the veranda. White surfaces accentuate the natural wood accents, subtle touches of green and blue, and exquisite ocean light. The open-concept space includes a dining table, a comfortable lounge, and a fully equipped kitchen with chef-grade appliances and breakfast bar. The kitchen joins seamlessly with the outdoor grilling station and easily serves both tables.

The main house includes four suites with king beds and one with a pair of twin beds. Three of the suites open to furnished private balconies with expansive vistas, and one of the suites opens to the pool terrace. The guesthouse has two bedrooms with a shared bathroom and kitchenette, ideal for mature kids or a small family.

Beach Enclave enjoys 520 feet of beach frontage along a calm stretch of sea, a perfect space for swimming and watersports. The villa is also within five kilometers of Provo Golf Club and Grace Bay Beach, and eight kilometers from Princess Alexandra National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in an exclusive development of only 15 units surrounded by colorful tropical gardens, Sandy Cove 402 is one of the finest penthouses on the West Coast of Barbados. The parish of St. James is renown for its sparkling white sands and calm turquoise bars. With outstanding panoramas of the Caribbean Sea and access to a secluded beach, this stunning oceanfront vacation rental offers guests a luxurious haven to relax and unwind in this idyllic setting!

Sandy Cove 402 showcases a large open sundeck surrounded by golden palms, bougainvillea and desert roses. The sundeck also features a private swimming pool and outdoor shower. You will also find an alfresco dining set and sun beds. Inside, a well appointed office is equipped with a printer and Wi-Fi. The unit also has a temperature controlled wine cellar on the lower level. Guests of this residence also have access to the communal free-form swimming pool, exercise room, sauna and beach facilities of the complex.

Sandy Cove 402 has been appointed to the highest standard and its tasteful decor and furnishings will appeal to discerning guests. Decorated in a modern, yet colonial style, the elegant lounge with a piano opens onto a large balcony, an ideal place for sipping cocktails and watching the cruise ships sail away into the sunset. The large, fully equipped kitchen opens onto the elegant dining room which is located on another large balcony offering stunning views of the ocean. The formal dining area with sea view makes a great place to share a special announcement with your friends and family.

Four exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, dual vanities, ceiling fans and televisions accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. The master bedroom also features a bidet and a lounge. Three suites also provide balconies at this impressive holiday home.

Sandy Cove 402 is located next to the world renowned Cliff Restaurant and only a short distance from Sandy Lane Hotel. Also within easy driving distance are the shops and restaurants of Holetown, the Mount Gay Rum Distillery and the Royal Westmoreland Golf Course. A little further away lies the island’s capital, Bridgetown, whose various historical sites give a feeling of what life must have been like in a bygone era. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats in Barbados!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

From the moment you arrive in Cabo San Lucas, you will find a plethora of fun tropical activities. Villa Paradiso Perduto is located where the Sea of Cortez meets the Pacific Ocean, where you can enjoy the casual beach atmosphere or the constant party of Cabo San Lucas nightlife. From its spectacular sunrise views from the master suite to breathtaking sunset views from the main house, all overlooking the Sea of Cortez, Villa Paradiso Perduto is truly one of Cabo’s most unique residences.

This villa takes luxury and style to the pinnacle, with an outdoor dining area for twelve, an outdoor living room with a fire pit, a massive wrap-around pool with a built-in hot tub, a state of the art gym, a private spa with an outdoor steam room and a massage room. Relax in this gem of the Los Cabos community. With daily housekeeping and a security guard, you’ll feel safe and at home during your stay at Villa Paradiso Perduto.

The fusion of Mediterranean and contemporary architecture decorated with soothing palates, coupled with spectacular views of the sea, leads to an experience that combines elegance, excitement and casual comfort. Whether you’re relaxing in the large gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and rich cabinetry, the two story great room with dining for twelve and double-height fireplace or the elegant bar area with a card table and dual televisions, you’re sure to feel right at home in the lap of luxury.

With eight bedrooms accommodating up to sixteen guests, this villa is perfect for family reunions or corporate retreats. Each bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom, king or queen sized bed, air conditioning, television and a stereo system. With most bedrooms providing inspirational ocean views, you’ll never want to leave this Mexican paradise.

The unique combination of desert terrain, mountains and beautiful beaches make for many exciting attractions for every type of visitor. Fishing and golf are the top two Cabo San Lucas activities, yet whatever your preference is, your Cabo vacation is sure to provide. Situated in the exclusive new golf resort of Puerto Los Cabos and perched over 180 feet above sea level, but within easy walking distance to the beach, Paradiso Perduto will take your holiday to a whole new level.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Casa Buch is a superb luxury villa located within the resort community of Puerto Los Cabos outside San José del Cabo, with access to Fundadores Beach Club. Perched on a gentle slope along the East Cape, the home features ample outdoor living and dining areas with expansive views of the ocean, mountains, and golf fairways, while its light-filled interiors blend high-end features with a rustic, bohemian elegance. Five lovely bedrooms including a private, three-bed casita offer ideal accommodations for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to ten in size.

The villa's terrace and veranda form a theater for savoring the gentle ocean breeze and panoramic views. Steep your body in the hot tub and bathe in the swimming pool while gazing upon the vast tableau of coast, sea, and sky. Kindle the barbeque in the afternoon and relish a meal in the pergola's dappled shade. Sip home-made cocktails in the evening as the sky transforms over the Sea of Cortez.

The villa's casual elegance embodies the quintessential vibe of Los Cabos. The open-concept living room features multiple sitting areas and tables, its luminous white tones complementing the natural wood accents and touches of sea-inspired blue. Pocket doors create a dreamy current of air between the pool terrace, interiors, and courtyard. The adjoining kitchen features chef-grade appliances and generous prep space including an island with wet bar.

The main house includes two king bedrooms and two guestrooms with pairs of double beds. The master suite boasts a cavernous bathroom and a private balcony with breathtaking views. Both of the double bedrooms open to the pool terrace, while the second king bedroom opens to the courtyard though a comfortable TV den. The casita includes a queen bed, two smaller beds, and a living area with kitchenette.

Puerto Los Cabos features 2,000 acres of oceanfront property, including a marina, Fundadores Beach Club, and golf courses designed by Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman. Your villa is also within minutes of Puerto Los Cabos Golf Course and an easy drive to Palmilla. Playa Las Palmas Beach and Costa Azul Beach are both within easy reach, while the enchanting colonial streets of San José del Cabo are just seven kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
